name: Espace Box
description:
Espace Box, a game that you need to find a way to get out of every room, there will be 15 rooms, but for the moment this is a development / testing built project and is not done, you can copy the style that I used for this solo project. 

Enjoy :)

HOW TO PLAY:

To install and download the game you need firstly to press the ' Download' button below and get throw the installation guide, once you install the game, find the location left click and extract it. after all that click the 'Escape Box.exe' twice and it should open.
